author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

Remove legacy CUDA pixel local reconstruction:
  - Remove legacy CUDA beamspot modules
  - Remove legacy CUDA pixel rechits modules
  - Remove legacy CUDA pixel clustering modules
  - Remove legacy CUDA pixel seeding modules
  - Remove legacy CUDA pixel digi converter modules
  - Remove CUDA-related code from the legacy pixel converter and the `PixelCPEFast`
  - Convert remaining uses to `pixelClustering` constants and `SiPixelHitStatus` data formats

#### PR validation:

Matrix tests pass.
title: Remove legacy CUDA pixel local reconstruction
